title: Purple Dinosaurs Recruiting
body:
Hi, me and a friend are making a team for Ranked and Normal's so far its just us right now, but we are looking for a mid/top/supp there are no real requirements besides the following .

Requirements:

**-Ages 15+**
**-No raging**- we don't care if you swear just as long as you don't get carried away
**-Have a sense of humor**- we joke around a lot so don't take much of what were saying to seriously
**-Be online**- look we get it... we all have  a life away from our computers.  If you're not playing on weekdays and sometimes week ends that's o.k  but just try to be online most of the time :P
**-Have Fun!**- This team is all about fun nothing to try-hard about it (except for ranked) 

 
To chat were thinking Curse Voice or Skype a link to both will we at the bottom of this thread  try to get both.

Skype- http://www.skype.com/en/download-skype/skype-for-windows/downloading/
Curse Voice-http://beta.cursevoice.com/

replies.body: Sweet sent u an invite, lets start practicing!

I'm keen to join :)
IGN: Wat U Lookin At
Im keen set u inv in game
I'll join but I'm away til Sunday. Ign: 0dyssey (with a zero) I can do any role but pref mid or support
yo if thiers a spot left im keen will fill whateva role is left over
yes there is just add me in game
